# BaseContractForAddress type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BaseContractForAddress<TAddress extends ContractAddress> =
  BaseContractInterface<
    ContractFunctionsFromAbi<ExtractAbiForContract<TAddress>>
  >;
```

**References:** [BaseContractInterface](./sdk.basecontractinterface.md), [ContractFunctionsFromAbi](./sdk.contractfunctionsfromabi.md), [ExtractAbiForContract](./sdk.extractabiforcontract.md)
